entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @TeamTrump @fema @RepMarkMeadows @GOPLeader @senatemajldr Thank you and the Coronavirus Task Force for ALL your hard work, it is MUCH appreciated. Thank you for donating your salary as President of the United States toward great causes. I am confident we will WIN the war with this virus with you as President, thank you once again! 💯👍
